Text.Page:
You like my kitty?

I also have these funny little creaturesâ€”go everywhere with me. Tiny brains, but they're sharp. A little training, and they can snatch items from the packs of unsuspecting strangers. Not that I promote such things.

They can be very useful. Too bad they smell awful. I see your nose twitching, it's not me, I swear.
